Reference

All functions

colloc_input_data

Distinctive collocates data

df_cm

Interrater data for conceptual metaphors

df_cxn_pattern

Interrater data for the constructional patterns

df_meta_use_1st

Interrater data for metaphorical usages of the pattern (1st round)

df_meta_use_2nd

Interrater data for metaphorical usages of the pattern (2nd round)

dist_colloc_gloss

Gloss for the distinctive collocates

get_cic_meta_lu()

Retrieve the conventionalised Lexical Units of a metaphor

get_creative_metaphors()

Retrieve the top-10 creative metaphors

get_frames()

Retrieve the descriptive distributional statistics of source frames

get_lexically_diverse_metaphors()

Retrieve the top-10 lexically diverse metaphors

get_lu_frame_table()

Retrieve the (top-n most frequent) Lexical Units evoking the source frames of a metaphor

get_lu_submappings_table()

Retrieve the frequency of Lexical units and the evoked submappings

get_lu_table()

Retrieve the (top-n most frequent) Lexical Units of a metaphor

get_meta_freq_profiles()

Select a (set of) frequency profile column(s) for a metaphor

get_submappings()

Retrieve the submappings of the metaphors overall or by synonyms/words

kappa_tidy()

Calculate Kappas for interrater agreement trial

mdca()

Multiple distinctive collexeme analysis (MDCA)

mdca_attr()

Attracted items from MDCA

mdca_repel()

Repelled items from MDCA

numbers2words()

Turn numbers into words

phd_data_metaphor

The main metaphor data frame

plot_body_part()

Plot most frequent body-part terms

plot_cxn_interrater()

Top constructional patterns

scaps()

Small-capital

top_cxn_data

Interrater data for the top constructional patterns

ttr()

Perform the frequency profiles of metaphors in Rajeg (2019, Chapter 5 and Chapter 6)
